CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK(CreatedDate)), ( 5 * FLOOR( ( IF( NOT(ISBLANK(ClosedDate)), DATEVALUE(ClosedDate), TODAY() ) - DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) ) / 7 ) + MIN(5, MOD( IF( NOT(ISBLANK(ClosedDate)), DATEVALUE(ClosedDate), TODAY() ) - DATEVALUE(CreatedDate), 7 )) ) + ( CASE( MOD(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) - DATE(1900, 1, 1), 7), 0, 1, 1, 1, 2, 1, 3, 1, 4, 1, 5, 1, 6, 0, 0 ) * ( 24 - VALUE(MID(TEXT(CreatedDate), 12, 2)) - (VALUE(MID(TEXT(CreatedDate), 15, 2)) / 60.0) ) / 24.0 ) + ( CASE( MOD( IF( NOT(ISBLANK(ClosedDate)), DATEVALUE(ClosedDate), TODAY() ) - DATE(1900, 1, 1), 7 ), 0, 1, 1, 1, 2, 1, 3, 1, 4, 1, 5, 1, 6, 0, 0 ) * ( VALUE(MID( TEXT( IF( NOT(ISBLANK(ClosedDate)), ClosedDate, NOW() ) ), 12, 2 )) + (VALUE(MID( TEXT( IF( NOT(ISBLANK(ClosedDate)), ClosedDate, NOW() ) ), 15, 2 )) / 60.0) ) / 24.0 ) - 1, NULL )
CustomField.label: Business Days to Close
